text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus walkeri is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Prunus walkeri". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30866A9578445. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30866A9578445.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
